China's TCL out to revive BlackBerry smartphones

description: [AFP] - Chinese electronics company TCL Corporation was at CES with a plan to revive BlackBerry handsets knocked from the mobile phone throne by Apple and Google. TCL is putting its market clout behind the design, manufacture and marketing of a new portfolio of BlackBerry smartphones, trusting that its solid position in the market will renew faith in the brand. "What sells a product is confidence in your underlying capabilities and that there is a future," said Steve Cistulli, general manager for TCL Communication Technology Holdings Limited of North America.
title: China's TCL out to revive BlackBerry smartphones
